title: Bought the "Three Hunters Borders and Final Hunt Icon" How do I use them?
body: Heyo, So I've been grinding these project points and just all inned on this border, because her it's a border I want one. How do I use it? I don't have any of the assassin champs unlocked, the ones that have the skins at least...

replies.body: Boxleitner's response is spot on!  You'll want to grab the skin and champ to see the border.  Your border is already unlocked, so you can grab the skin/champ at any time without worry.

So it doesn't matter which  champ I buy, as long as it has project skin and I buy that skin. 
I ask because I have Project Zed and tried on custom game, and I didn't see my border.
edit: tried in pvp match with Project Zed and border didn't show up.
Any advice? Thanks.
It wouldn't have a border for Zed as the Three Hunters borders only include Jhin, Vi, and Vayne. Zed's border would've only been available when it first came out.

I believe that once you buy the icon and borders, all you have to do is unlock each champion and then that champion's Project skin.

Once you choose the skin for a match, you'll see the border when you load for the match.

You can buy the champs and skins whenever you wish; you've got the border waiting for you.

Am I right, Riot?
You are right!  Thanks for this great response.  :D
